channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 情報源サンダンス、2027年の映画祭移転に向け15カ所からの提案を検討中、9月末頃に内部で決定予定（Dominic Patten/Deadline）
item.description:
Dominic Patten / Deadline:
Sources: Sundance is weighing proposals from 15 locations to move the festival in 2027; a decision is expected internally around the end of September  —  EXCLUSIVE: The Sundance Film Festival is looking South for a potential new home, as well as in its backyard.

item.title: 政治、億万長者、ビジネスを担当するパックのテディ・シュライファーが、ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙の政治デスク特派員として採用された（ニューヨーク・タイムズ社）。
item.description:
The New York Times Company:
Puck's Teddy Schleifer, who covers politics, billionaires, and business, has been hired by The New York Times as a correspondent on the Politics desk  —  Teddy, previously a David Rosenbaum reporting fellow in Washington, will be a correspondent on the Politics desk.  —  Folks,

item.title: ビッグ・ルー・メディアは、セントルイスのオルト週刊誌「リバーフロント・タイムズ」を非公開の買い手に売却し、執筆・編集スタッフ全員を解雇した（STLPR）。
item.description:
STLPR:
Big Lou Media has sold The Riverfront Times, an alt weekly in St. Louis, Mo, to an undisclosed buyer, and the entire writing and editing staff has been laid off  —  The Riverfront Times, St. Louis' alt-weekly newspaper, is no more, at least in its current state.

item.title: WBDとESPNが5年契約を結び、WBDのTNTが2024年と2025年にカレッジフットボールのプレーオフ1回戦2試合を放送、2026年には準々決勝2試合を追加する（Alex Sherman/CNBC）
item.description:
Alex Sherman / CNBC:
WBD and ESPN strike a five-year deal letting WBD's TNT carry two first-round college football playoff games in 2024 and 2025, adding two quarterfinals in 2026  —  In a move to strengthen its sports offerings, Warner Bros. Discovery has signed a five-year sublicensing deal with Disney's ESPN …

item.title: News CorpとOpenAIが、News CorpのニュースコンテンツをOpenAIに提供するための複数年契約を発表。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
News Corp and OpenAI announce a multiyear agreement to bring News Corp's news content to OpenAI; sources: the deal could be worth $250M over five years  —  Agreement could generate over $250 million over five years for News Corp in cash and credits  —  Wall Street Journal owner News Corp struck …

item.title: 米FCC委員長のジェシカ・ローゼンウォーセルが、ディープフェイクの利用を理由に、ラジオやテレビの政治広告でAIが生成したコンテンツの開示を義務付けることを提案（David Shepardson/Reuters）
item.description:
David Shepardson / Reuters:
US FCC Chairwoman Jessica Rosenworcel proposes requiring the disclosure of content generated by AI in political ads on radio and TV, citing the use of deepfakes  —  U.S. Federal Communications Commission Chairwoman Jessica Rosenworcel on Wednesday proposed requiring disclosure of content generated …

item.title: メール配信を減らし、有料購読者にコンテンツへの早期アクセスを提供することで、ニューヨーカー誌のサイト内ページビューとニュースレター利用者の滞在時間をどのように改善したか（Sara Guaglione/Digiday）
item.description:
Sara Guaglione / Digiday:
How sending fewer emails and giving paid subscribers early access to content improved The New Yorker's onsite page views and time spent from newsletter users  —  The New Yorker has refocused its newsletter strategy in an effort to retain its cohort of 1.2 million paid subscribers and grow …

item.title: TV視聴者の高齢化に伴い、メディア幹部はTVのマス・マーケットへのリーチを重視し、広告主にとっての年齢の重要性を軽視している（ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
As TV audiences get older, media executives are focusing more on the mass-market reach of TV, and playing down the importance of age for advertisers  —  With viewers in their 60s, networks aren't pretending to have youth appeal; they're touting the virtues of older audiences

item.title: Rolling Stone社は、サウジアラビアの国営投資ファンドPIFが所有するESL FACEIT Groupと提携し、ゲームバーティカル「RS Gaming」を立ち上げる（Chris Kerr/Game Developer）
item.description:
Chris Kerr / Game Developer:
Rolling Stone launches RS Gaming, a game vertical in partnership with ESL FACEIT Group, which is owned by Saudi state-backed investment fund PIF  —  Rolling Stone is expanding its coverage of the video game industry with the launch of a dedicated gaming vertical.

item.title: NexstarのNewsNationは週末のスケジュールに夕方のニュースブロックを加え、24時間365日放送のネットワークへと変貌を遂げる（Ted Johnson/Deadline）
item.description:
Ted Johnson / Deadline:
Nexstar's NewsNation adds an early evening news block to its weekend schedule, completing its transformation into a 24/7 network  —  NewsNation is adding an early evening news block to its weekend schedule, completing its transformation into a 24/7 network.

item.title: [スレッド】ワシントン・ポスト紙のウィル・ルイスCEOが会議で、同紙が昨年1年間で7700万ドルの損失を出し、2020年以降、読者数が50％減少したことを伝えた（Max Tani/@maxwelltani）
item.description:
Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
[Thread] In a meeting, Washington Post CEO Will Lewis told staff that the paper lost $77M over the past year, and saw a 50% drop off in audience since 2020  —  Washington Post CEO Will Lewis is introing the paper's new “Build It” plan today. In a meeting with staff, he noted that the paper lost $77 million over the past year, and saw a 50% drop off in audience since 2020: “To be direct, we are in a hole, and we have been for some time.”

item.title: 情報筋タタ・グループがディズニーの29.8％株を買い取り、定額テレビ放送局タタ・プレイの全権を掌握、タタ・プレイの評価額は約10億ドル（Bloomberg）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Tata Group took full control of subscription TV broadcaster Tata Play after buying Disney's 29.8% stake, valuing Tata Play at about $1B  —  - Tata Group gains full control of Tata Play after Disney deal  — Tata bought out Temasek's stake in platform earlier this year

item.title: TikTokがブランド向けAIスイート「Symphony」を発表、ジェネレーティブAIでマーケターがスクリプトを書き、動画を制作し、現在の資産を強化できるように（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
TikTok launches its Symphony AI suite for brands, using generative AI to let marketers write scripts, produce videos, and enhance current assets  —  TikTok is the latest tech company to incorporate generative AI into its ads business, as the company announced on Tuesday that it's launching a new “TikTok Symphony” AI suite for brands.

item.title: 英国を拠点とするスタジオ「アントン」が、長編映画とTVシリーズの開発・製作を拡大するため、ブラックロックが運用するファンドと口座を中心に1億ユーロを調達した（Alex Ritman/Variety）
item.description:
Alex Ritman / Variety:
UK-based studio Anton raised €100M led by BlackRock-managed funds and accounts to expand its feature film and TV series development and production  —  Anton, the European production, financing and sales group behind “Greenland,” is set to ramp up its output following a significant injection of funds.

item.title: 情報源：NBAはディズニー、NBC、アマゾンと正式契約を結んでおり、WBDが訴訟を起こす可能性がある。ESPNは年間28億ドル、NBCは26億ドル、アマゾンは18億ドルから20億ドルを支払う可能性がある（Tom Friend/Sports Business Journal）
item.description:
Tom Friend / Sports Business Journal:
Sources: the NBA is formalizing deals with Disney, NBC, and Amazon, which may prompt WBD to sue; ESPN may pay $2.8B annually, NBC $2.6B, and Amazon $1.8B to $2B  —  NEW YORK — The NBA is formalizing written contracts with Disney, NBC and Amazon this week, with sources calling it the final stage …
